product_name: Mountain Hardwear Hooded Compressor Jacket - Men's
long_description: Lightweight and warm, the synthetic-insulated Mountain Hardwear Hooded Compressor jacket for men is perfect on its own for cold belays, or under your shell jacket in really cold conditions. Body is insulated with 100g of lightweight Thermal.Q(TM) Elite polyester; sleeves are filled with 80g to increase mobility. Insulated hood has single-pull adjustment system. Soft, butter-jersey knit cuffs seal in warmth. Mountain Hardwear Hooded Compressor jacket for men has zippered hand pockets and an internal zippered pocket to secure small items.
short_description: Lightweight and warm, the synthetic-insulated Mountain Hardwear Hooded Compressor jacket for men is perfect on its own for cold belays, or under your shell jacket in really cold conditions.
